languages.text: "Вы с Каллигосом совсем спятили? Простор раздирает кризис, а вы сводите счеты! Надо немедленно примириться".
"Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."
languages.original_text: "Вы с Каллигосом совсем спятили? Простор раздирает кризис, а вы сводите счеты! Надо немедленно примириться".

traits.locale_text: "Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Koronus Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."
"Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Koronus Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."
"Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."
"Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."
"Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."
"Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."

languages.text: “你和卡里戈斯都疯了吗？科罗努斯扩区整处于灾难之中，你们两个却在忙着翻旧账！你们必须立刻住手。”
languages.original_text: "Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."

traits.locale_text: “你和卡里戈斯都疯了吗？科罗努斯扩区整处于灾难之中，你们两个却在忙着翻旧账！你们必须立刻住手。”

languages.text: 「お前もカリゴスも頭がおかしくなったのか？エクスパンスは破滅的な状態にある。なのに、お前たち二人は決着をつけるのに大忙しだと！今すぐ止めるべきだ」
languages.original_text: "Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."

traits.locale_text: 「お前もカリゴスも頭がおかしくなったのか？エクスパンスは破滅的な状態にある。なのに、お前たち二人は決着をつけるのに大忙しだと！今すぐ止めるべきだ」

languages.text: «¿Es que se han vuelto locos Calligos y usted? ¡La Extensión hecha un desastre y ustedes ocupados ajustando cuentas! Deben poner fin a esto de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es que se han vuelto locos Calligos y usted? ¡La Extensión hecha un desastre y ustedes ocupados ajustando cuentas! Deben poner fin a esto de inmediato».

languages.text: "Habt Ihr den Verstand verloren, Ihr und Calligos? Die ganze Ausdehnung ist katastrophaler Gefahr ausgesetzt, und Ihr zwei vergeudet Zeit mit persönlichen Streitigkeiten! Ihr müsst das unverzüglich einstellen."
languages.original_text: "Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr den Verstand verloren, Ihr und Calligos? Die ganze Ausdehnung ist katastrophaler Gefahr ausgesetzt, und Ihr zwei vergeudet Zeit mit persönlichen Streitigkeiten! Ihr müsst das unverzüglich einstellen."

languages.text: « Avez-vous perdu la tête, Calligos et vous ? Les Étendues sont dans un état déplorable et vous ne faites que régler vos comptes ! Vous devez cesser immédiatement. »
languages.original_text: "Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous perdu la tête, Calligos et vous ? Les Étendues sont dans un état déplorable et vous ne faites que régler vos comptes ! Vous devez cesser immédiatement. »

languages.text: "Sen ve Calligos aklınızı mı yitirdiniz? Enginlik vahim durumda ve siz ikiniz birbirinizle didişmekle meşgulsünüz! Buna bir an önce son verin."
languages.original_text: "Have you and Calligos lost your minds? The Expanse is in a calamitous state, and you two are busy settling scores! You must cease this at once."

traits.locale_text: "Sen ve Calligos aklınızı mı yitirdiniz? Enginlik vahim durumda ve siz ikiniz birbirinizle didişmekle meşgulsünüz! Buna bir an önce son verin."
